input_email_body:
Subject: Notification of Ongoing Network Disruptions

Dear Customer Support Team, 

We have been experiencing intermittent network disruptions, potentially arising from misconfigurations in our Cisco Router ISR4331. Please investigate this issue and offer assistance on a solution at your earliest convenience You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. We appreciate your prompt help. 

Best regards, 

<name> My name is David Kim.
